tool.name: SAGA.imagery_maxent.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTRAINING False isArrayFIELD False isArrayFEATURES_NUM True isArrayFEATURES_CAT True isArrayYT_FILE_LOAD False isArrayYT_FILE_SAVE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES output_data_PROB $output_data_PROB output_data_PROBS $output_data_PROBS name SAGA.imagery_maxent.0 TRAINING $TRAINING FIELD $FIELD FEATURES_NUM $FEATURES_NUM FEATURES_CAT $FEATURES_CAT PROBS_CREATE $PROBS_CREATE METHOD $METHOD YT_FILE_LOAD $YT_FILE_LOAD YT_FILE_SAVE $YT_FILE_SAVE YT_REGUL $YT_REGUL YT_REGUL_VAL $YT_REGUL_VAL YT_NUMASREAL $YT_NUMASREAL DL_ALPHA $DL_ALPHA DL_THRESHOLD $DL_THRESHOLD DL_ITERATIONS $DL_ITERATIONS NUM_CLASSES $NUM_CLASSES PROB_MIN $PROB_MIN prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES outputType_PROB $OutputSection_PROB.outputType_PROB transmissionMode_PROB $OutputSection_PROB.transmissionMode_PROB outputType_PROBS $OutputSection_PROBS.outputType_PROBS transmissionMode_PROBS $OutputSection_PROBS.transmissionMode_PROBS

param.name: TRAINING
param.label: Training Areas
param.help: Training Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Class Name
param.help: Class Name The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FEATURES_NUM
param.label: Numerical Features
param.help: Numerical Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: FEATURES_CAT
param.label: Categorical Features
param.help: Categorical Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: YT_FILE_LOAD
param.label: Load from File...
param.help: Load from File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: YT_FILE_SAVE
param.label: Save to File...
param.help: Save to File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: PROB_MIN
param.label: Minimum Probability
param.help: Minimum probability to accept a classification result for a cell.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_PROB
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_PROBS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
